Package Management.GeneralManagement

Class AnimatedThing

java.lang.Object
Management.GeneralManagement.NonAnimatedThing
Management.GeneralManagement.AnimatedThing
public class AnimatedThing extends NonAnimatedThing
A special type of NonAnimatedThing which have an animated displayed element, such as airships.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimatedThing

      public AnimatedThing​(String fileName, double x, double y, int width, int height, int numberSprite, int fitWidth, int fitHeight)
      Creates a new instance of AnimatedThing.
      The node created will have the position (x,y) on the screen, and the size of the original image will be readjusted, as the class extends NonAnimatedThing.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file with the sprite sheet of the displayed element
      x - the x coordinate of the displayed element
      y - the y coordinate of the displayed element
      width - the width of a sprite in the original image
      height - the height of a sprite in the original image
      numberSprite - the number of different sprites
      fitWidth - the resized width of a displayed sprite
      fitHeight - the resized height of a displayed sprite

  • Method Details

    • updateAnimated

      public void updateAnimated​(long time)
      Update the animation of the AnimatedThing.
      Every 0.1 second, the sprite of the element changes to display the next one. Each sprite must be included inside a sprite sheet with every image on the same line, with the same size and height. Once the last sprite has been reached, the method return to the first sprite.
      Parameters:
      time - the timestamp of the current frame given in nanoseconds
